hooks.name: axon-dependency-check
hooks.command: command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker compose ps --status running 2>/dev/null | grep -Eq '(axon-|firecrawl)' || echo '⚠️  Axon services not running. Run: docker compose up -d'
hooks.description: Check if Axon Docker services are running on session start
